mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Stu_mark_info (stuid, course_name, base_score, test_score, final_score, add_date, note) VALUES (#{stuId}, #{courseName}, #{baseScore}, #{testScore}, #{finalScore}, #{addDate}, #{note})
mapper.select:
SELECT Stu_mark_info.markid markId, Stu_mark_info.stuid stuId, Stu_mark_info.course_name courseName, Stu_mark_info.base_score baseScore, Stu_mark_info.test_score testScore, Stu_mark_info.final_score finalScore, Stu_mark_info.add_date addDate, Stu_mark_info.note, student_Info.stuname stuName FROM Stu_mark_info JOIN student_Info ON student_Info.stuid = Stu_mark_info.stuid
WHERE
stuname LIKE "%"#{stuName}"%"
AND
add_date >= #{addDate} AND add_date < #{afterDay}
